content.webTitle: Broadchurch series two: what did you think of the opening episode?

fields.headline: Broadchurch series two: what did you think of the opening episode?
fields.bodyText: Now the second series of Chris Chibnall’s acclaimed seaside drama has been unveiled, share your first thoughts on the new story. Did #theendiswhereitbegins mean what you thought it would? And will this return trip to Broadchurch prove as gripping as the first mystery?
